entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Wind light except northeast 30 km/h near mainland valleys and inlets. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 10:12 PM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind light except northeast 30 km/h near mainland valleys and inlets in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 10:12 PM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Rain beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 10:12 PM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
